item.title: SoftLayer_Network_Storage_Allowed_Host_IpAddress
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_Storage_Allowed_Host_IpAddress Service Datatype Description Local credentialId The credential this allowed host will use Type: integer id The internal identifier of the igroup Type: integer name The name of allowed host, usually an IQN or other identifier Type: string resourceTableId Type: integer resourceTableName Type: string Relational account The SoftLayer_Account object which this SoftLayer_Network_Storage_Allowed_Host belongs to.
